testcase.name: check whether the sum of items in the bag is correct
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "https://www.yoox.com/it/uomo"..........................passed And I go to item selection's page...........................................passed When I add two random prioducts to the bag..................................passed And I navigate to the bag...................................................passed And I add one more instance of a product....................................passed Then The final price must be correct........................................passed
